task_background: Prepare the competitive mini-golf course for a high-stakes tournament by addressing maintenance issues and setting up themed zones.

tasks.task_description: Turn on the control monitors in the entrance control booth.
Erase the writing on the whiteboard in the entrance control booth.
Find the heaviest wooden object in the pirate cove and move it to the storage workshop.
Find the only object in the jungle zone that is made of fiberglass and stop its running process.
Repair the unhooked rope bridge in the jungle zone using the replacement bridge hook from the storage workshop.
Use the windmill repair kit to fix the overheating windmill in the pirate cove and then stop its running process.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the hydraulic panel on the S.S. Putter in the pirate cove.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to cover the whiteboard in the entrance control booth.
Move the leaking waterfall hazard from the jungle zone to the storage workshop.
Move the S.S. Putter tilting ship deck from the pirate cove to the storage workshop.
Cooperatively move the rope bridge in the jungle zone to the storage workshop and use the replacement bridge hook to fix it.
